summary: An FBI Crisis Intake document from July 9, 2019, recording a tip from an anonymous caller regarding a Russian-American man named Igor, who allegedly served as Jeffrey Epstein's personal bodyguard for 10 years and was present during many of the accused activities. The caller believes Igor possesses important information for the FBI.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the FBI investigation for child sex trafficking. The document states the caller's friend Igor was his personal bodyguard for 10 years.

persons.name: Igor
persons.context: A Russian-American man, last name unknown, identified by the caller as Jeffrey Epstein's personal bodyguard for 10 years, present during many of the accused activities. He currently lives in an unspecified location and works as a personal trainer.

connections.description: Igor served as Epstein's personal bodyguard for 10 years, traveling with him and being present during many of the accused activities.

events.title: FBI Crisis Intake Call Regarding Epstein Bodyguard
events.description: An anonymous caller contacts the FBI National Threat Operations Center to provide information about Igor, Epstein's former bodyguard, believing he has useful information for the investigation.

keyFacts: A tip was provided to the FBI on July 9, 2019, regarding a key associate of Jeffrey Epstein named Igor.
Igor is described as a Russian-American who served as Epstein's personal bodyguard for 10 years.
The caller stated Igor was present when 'many of the things Epstein is accused of, were happening.'
The caller requested Igor not get in trouble and that his name information not be disclosed, but believed he possessed important information for the FBI.
The document identifies Igor's current occupation as a personal trainer, though his specific location is redacted.
